1.0.32.en: Better power calculation for 3-phase chargers. Select between ideal and estimated battery range in Adv. settings.

1.0.31.en: Do not poll every minute when plugged in, but not charging. Added setting for minimum refresh interval for streaming.

1.0.30.en: Added latitude and longitude as capabilities.

1.0.29.en: Speed and odometer is not saved to Insights.

1.0.28.en: Fixed timestamp check for calculating meter power.

1.0.22.en: Added speed and odometer to sensors. Use streaming API for speed, odometer and battery range. Actions to handle speed limit.

1.0.21.en: Add location by longitude and latitude to geofence.
